messages.subject: Re: Ned, Censorship, List Manners
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, good. :) I m so relieved you ve finally seen what people have been trying to say. I was worried for awhile that you were being intentionally
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2813
>Date: Tue, Jan 7, 2003, 6:02 PM
>

> "Vaguely ...maybe...maybe...no idea...was like...was hooked on phonics...."
> These sound like such terribly offensive things for a person to have done,
> I'm SURE you had no personal animosity or unspoken reason to start a campaign
> to get him forcibly removed. And, I'm SURE that everyone else will speak
> honestly and from the heart, and never fear the same treatment."


Oh, good. :) I'm so relieved you've finally seen what people have been
trying to say. I was worried for awhile that you were being intentionally
obstreperous and had no thought of trying to be thoughtful about this. I
apologize for suspecting such a thing.

Whew, that's a load off MY mind.

Pam
